infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to record videos and take photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio with videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save and manage your media.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to tag your media with location data.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SnapIt to access your camera
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow SnapIt to access your microphone
